alert.note: Alert for Western Marion (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 11:49AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Thunderstorms, with heavy rainfall. will impact portions of northwestern Marion County through 1215 PM EDT... At 1148 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Williston to 8 miles northeast of Rainbow Lakes Estates. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Flemington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Heavy rainfall is occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
